attributes.action: create an open inquiry into the 1984 miners strike
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: we need to look into the role the police played in the miners strike, their actions, the use of alleged violence against miners and communities,alligations of an orchestrated set up at Orgreave,how tv footage was changed to show the opposite of what happened, the use of army personnel in police uniforms
